title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Skills: Flipped Learning-Based Advanced Mathematics Concepts Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental math concepts and ability to use online learning tools

Learners improve complex math problem-solving skills by 50% through in-class collaborative activities.
Learners achieve an average performance improvement of over 15% in formative and summative assessments.
